text: Goodnight Sweetheart is a 1993 British science fictional comedy sitcom, network on BBC One, stars Nicholas Lyndhurst, Victor McGuire, Christopher Ettridge, Elizabeth Carling, Emma Amos, Dervla Kirwan, Michelle Holmes, David Ryall, David Benson and Ronnie Stevens. The program creators are Laurence Marks and Maurice Gran. It on Goodnight Sweetheart characters.
